item.description:
Interesting and worthwhile art event in  a beautiful church in Copley Square, Boston.  Hope you can make it.  We'll spend about an hour and then adjourn for lunch in Copley Sq. Send suggestions if you'd like.

Here's the scoop:

Homeless and low-income artists will display their creations in a one-day show and sale. Everything from intricate jewelry to abstract and representational acrylics will be available from artists learning to express themselves through programs offered at On The Rise Inc., Common Art, Cambridge Women's Center, Pine Street Inn, St. Francis House, Rosie's Place, Woman's Lunch Place, and the New England Center for Homeless Veterans.
item.name: City HeArt Annual Art Show & Sale
